summary.Title: Senior Backend Developer
summary.Presentation: You’re an experienced backend developer looking to make an impact. We’re a global tech scale-up bringing fairness to the internet, billions of users at a time. Let's team up and do great things.

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
You’re an experienced backend developer looking to make an impact. We’re a global tech scale-up bringing fairness to the internet, billions of users at a time. Let's team up and do great things.

About us

Queue-it is a Danish tech scale-up that empowers the world’s biggest brands to deliver on their busiest days. Our virtual waiting rooms prevent website crashes and bot abuse to create a smoother, fairer online experience for 35 billion+ users.

Queue-it is a place where you can do what you are naturally best at to positively maintain your performance. We’re a diverse team coming from 50+ countries with offices in Denmark, the U.S., and Australia.

About the role

As a Senior Backend Developer, you’ll join an autonomous development team working towards Queue-it’s mission of online fairness for all. The team is responsible for all stages between the idea and final product, including design, architecture, implementation, testing, and operations – and you’ll have the chance to contribute to all of it.

Because we empower the world’s biggest brands to run smooth online events and fight online abuse (think scalpers, bots, and other bad actors), our systems need to be high quality and error-proof. To do this, we trust our developers. You are closest to the code, so you will see the edge cases and take pre-emptive actions to make our codebase resilient.

In other words, our developers aren’t ticket-takers; you’re the core of operations and your work will impact billions of end-users.

Responsibilities

Improve, extend, and maintain our existing bots and abuse SaaS offerings. Work on the team committed to beating back online abuse on behalf of our customers and end-users.

Build and release high-quality software. Every day, you’ll put your coding skills to the test, maintaining and improving our best.in-class platform.

Collaborate for success. Work with an empowered product team including developers, PM, and UX as well as the rest of the organization towards the mission of online fairness for all.

Qualifications

5+ years of experience with software development after graduation

Solid understanding of web technologies

Proficient in object-oriented software development (we use C#/Microsoft stack)

Experience with cloud infrastructure (we use AWS), JavaScript/Typescript, and NoSQL and/or SQL databases

Practical experience or knowledge/interest within Cybersecurity, networking, Data analysis, machine learning, and/or business intelligence

Proficiency in English (Danish not required)

An academic degree in Science, Technology, Engineering, or similar

We are looking for someone who

Likes finding exploits and traversing logs and data

Is a creative puzzle solver

Is team-oriented

Why Queue-it is a great place to work

Continuous learning: You’ll develop the mindset and skills to navigate whatever comes next.

Success as defined by you: We’ll provide the tools and flexibility, so you can make a meaningful impact, your way.

Diverse and inclusive culture: You’ll be embraced for who you are and empowered to use your voice so that others can find theirs. In a company with 50+ nationalities, you will be able to enjoy a truly intercultural and inclusive environment.

About the office 

Located in the heart of Copenhagen, the Queue-it headquarters offers modern amenities, collaborative spaces, and quiet zones to suit all work styles – plus games, ping pong, foosball, PS4, social events, clubs, and great coffee, lunch, & snacks!

--

Apply today!

Please submit all materials in English

Due to GDPR regulations, we cannot accept applications/CVs via email. Please apply online to be considered.

Queue-it is committed to employing a diverse staff. Qualified applicants will receive consideration without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, age, sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, veteran status, or disability.

Department

Technology

Role

Senior Backend Developer

Locations

Copenhagen - DK

Employment type

Full-time

Language

English
